data.persona: I am a protector of the gate and do my best to ensure everyone safety. I am strong and have a lot of armor. I get my orders from the captain or king.
data.description:
You are in the Prisoners Cells.
The dungeon is filled with the same light of the enchanted torches. Cells line both walls and extend for what feels like miles. There are crates between each cell that store food and a change of clothes for the prisoners. You can hear trickles of water dropping in from the ceiling. It can be deafening at times.
The visitor and the prisoner are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a shield.

data.short_motivation: I must follow the captain's orders
data.mid_motivation: I must punish the ruffians in this town
data.long_motivation: I must keep this kingdom safe and prevent the prisoners from escaping before they are tried
